attributes.action: Tanzanian President Magufuli MUST go! There is no freedom of speech.
attributes.additional_details:
There is no the RULE of Law in Tanzania or FREEDOM of speech. Whatever people say to the government, President Magufuli rejects. He thinks he is GOD. Magufuli is a PUBLIC ENEMY. 

"Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test men's character, give him power"- Abraham Lincoln

This is what reflects to Magufuli.

People are starving, dying but he doesnt care. Please help before BLOODSHED begins. Lot of people will die, especially women and children

Im a British who feel pain for Tanzanians
attributes.background:
Tanzanian President John Magufuli MUST go! There is no freedom of speech or rule of Law. 
Since he came to power in 2015, President Magufuli has been nothing but a DICTATOR. The Country is  now into chaos. If citizen speak a TRUTH they end up in prison. Tanzanian are the UNHAPPIEST people.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
